title: 78/117. Observer status for the Organization of Ibero-American States for Education, Science and Culture in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/78/117
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
11 December 2023 
 
23-24913 (E)    211223     
*2324913* 
 
 
Seventy-eighth session 
Agenda item 171 
Observer status for the Organization of Ibero-American 
States for Education, Science and Culture in the 
General Assembly  
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 7 December 2023 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/78/457, para. 7)] 
 
 
 
78/117. Observer status for the Organization of Ibero-American States for 
Education, Science and Culture in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
Organization of Ibero-American States for Education, Science and Culture, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Organization of Ibero-American States for Education, 
Science and Culture to participate in the sessions and the work of the General 
Assembly in the capacity of observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
45th plenary meeting 
7 December 2023

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Organization of Ibero-American States for Education, Science and Culture to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 45th plenary meeting 7 December 2023
